  • Method Details

    • getCurrentOrders

      @RequestMapping(value="/waiter", method=GET) public java.lang.String getCurrentOrders​(org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      RequestMapping for any GET requests coming from the waiterorderpage. Current orders are loaded from the database to be displayed and sent to frontend.
      Parameters:
      model - The database model
      request - HTTP request to request information from the page
      response - HTTP response to receive information from the page
      Returns:
      page (html file) to be loaded.

    • modifyButton

      @RequestMapping(value="/waiter/modifyorder", method=POST) public java.lang.String modifyButton​(@RequestParam java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> allParams, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws java.sql.SQLException, java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException, java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
      RequestMapping for any POST requests coming from the modify order button on each ticket.
      Parameters:
      allParams - Takes the mapping of values from the form/button
      redirectAttributes - Method for passing attributes to a redirect target
      request - HTTP request to request information from the page
      response - HTTP response to receive information from the page
      Returns:
      page (html file) to be loaded. Needs to redirect to prevent form post resubmission when reloading the page.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - when there is an error in a SQL statement
      java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - when an unsupported encoding method is encountered
      java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - when no algorithm exists

    • getOrder

      @RequestMapping(value="/modifyorder", method=GET) public java.lang.String getOrder​(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @RequestParam(required=false) java.lang.String orderId)
      RequestMapping for the modifyorder page. This is run when the page is loaded.
      Parameters:
      model - Contains attributes such as order details or an error message.
      orderId - Id of the order which is to be modified.
      Returns:
      String (name) of the page/html file to be loaded.

    • acceptButton

      @RequestMapping(value="/waiter/accept", method=POST) public java.lang.String acceptButton​(@RequestParam java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> allParams, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response, @CookieValue(value="staffid",defaultValue="-1") java.lang.String stringStaffId)
      RequestMapping for any POST requests coming from the accept order button on each ticket.
      Parameters:
      allParams - Takes the mapping of values from the form/button.
      request - HTTP request to request information from the page
      response - HTTP response to receive information from the page
      stringStaffId - Used to store the staff ID in cookies
      Returns:
      page (html file) to be loaded. Needs to redirect to prevent form post resubmission when reloading the page.

    • resolvedHelpRequest

      @RequestMapping(value="/waiter/resolvedHelpRequest", method=POST) public java.lang.String resolvedHelpRequest​(@RequestParam java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> allParams, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws java.sql.SQLException, java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException, java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
      This is called when the waiter presses the dismiss button on a help request notification.
      Parameters:
      allParams - Values from the form to get tablenum from.
      request - HTTP request to request information from the page
      response - HTTP response to receive information from the page
      Returns:
      page to be loaded/redirected, in this case the waiter page.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - when there is an error in a SQL statement
      java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - when an unsupported encoding method is encountered
      java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - when no algorithm exists

    • add

      @RequestMapping(value="/modifyorder/add", method=POST) public java.lang.String add​(@RequestParam java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> allParams, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws java.sql.SQLException, java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException, java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
      This is called when the waiter presses the add button on an order item.
      Parameters:
      allParams - Contains values from the form submitted, such as quantity.
      request - HTTP request to request information from the page
      response - HTTP response to receive information from the page
      Returns:
      String (page name) of the page/html file to be loaded.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - when there is an error in a SQL statement
      java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - when an unsupported encoding method is encountered
      java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - when no algorithm exists
